title: Akumeoy's Author Page
content:
+++ Hi! I'm Akumeoy.
You might also know me by my Wikidot username, which is "Communism will win". It's not ironic.

[[/collapsible]]

[[f>image securecommunismprotect.png width="200px"]]

+++ The web site of Akumeoy
My website, **[https://akumeoy.neocities.org World's Most Akumeoy in the World]**, has links to my other social media pages, extracurricular writing about the SCP Wiki, and up-to-date contact information.

+++ Some notes
* While Scranton Reality Anchors are named after me, I've had very little to do with their use on the wiki. I have no connection to the character of Robert Scranton.
* I would love to see any fan content that's made of my work, either by you or by someone else.
* I am not currently offering feedback on any creative projects. If you want me to //contribute// to a creative project, feel free to ask.
* I am not a member of the SCP Wiki. I almost certainly won't see the comments you leave on my articles, and if I do, I can't respond here.
* I have a few dozen newer articles that I've posted to [http://scpcommune.wikidot.com the SCP Commune]. Other people have also posted a lot of cool stuff there.
